page.title: 15Supernatural
page.content: Victoria was a girl of seven who lived in victorian times. Her father came home drunk, decapitated her and her mother, chopped them up and buried them in the garden. When Littlewoods was built on the site of the graveyard, Victoria had no living descendents to move her remains, so she was left. She haunts the lift and makes it stop for hours. There are minor floods when the taps have to be turned off with a monkey wrench, and the children's shoes are taken out of the stock bins every night. One size only is taken out of the shoe boxes. Another story from this area is about the ghost of White Nancy which haunts Meols Hall.She lived in the 18th century and after being shipwrecked was murdered by the Linaker family. The only people to see her are Linakers or those touched by them.
